generated_doNotEdit.title: Celebrate Survive Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to celebrate surviving a raid by shooting fireworks.

fields.title: Duration
fields.description: The duration in seconds that the celebration lasts for.

fields.title: Fireworks Interval
fields.description: Minimum and maximum time between firework (positive, in seconds).

fields.title: Celebration End Event
fields.description: The event to trigger when the goal's duration expires.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
